# init(mediaTypes:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a media item picker for specified media types.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(mediaTypes: MPMediaType)
```

## Parameters

- **mediaTypes**: A set representing the media types for the media item picker. See the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaType] enumeration.

## Return Value

A new media item picker.
title: init(mediaTypes:)
